entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 9:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -42.8°C
Wind: WNW 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
